p: It was estimated that BC haulage would cost between $0.26 to $14.17 per Mg feedstock (note that costs would be approximately four times greater per unit mass of BC), and that associated CO 2–C emissions would be in the range 0.02–1.3 kg C per Mg feedstock, calculated as shown in Supplementary Table 11, and equations (15, 16, 17, 18, 19). Calculation of mean rectilinear distance (RD) between BEBCS plant and sites for application of BC followed equations (15, 16, 17) below:
